text: This is a list of Arminia Bielefeld managers. Although the club was formed in 1905, it was not until 1922 when František Zoubek became the first manager of the club. The club had 48 managers in their history. The current manager is Frank Kramer, who was hired on 2 March 2021. == Managers == Name Nationality From To Events František Zoubek 1922 1923 West German champion 1923 Gerd Wellhöfer 1923 1924 Westfalian champion 1924 František Zoubek Gerd Wellhöfer 1924 1925 Westfalian champion 1925 Gerd Wellhöfer 1925 1926 Westfalian champion 1926 František Zoubek 1926 1933 Westfalian champion 1927, 1933 Westfalian cupwinner 1932 Otto Faist 1933 1935 Relegation from Gauliga 1934 Wellnecker 1935 1938 Promotion to Gauliga 1938 Erich Brochmeyer 1938 1939 Ferdinand Swatosch 1939 1940 Runners-up in Gauliga Otto Kranefeld 1940 1942 Karl Wunderlich 1942 1945 Erich Brochmeyer 1945 1946 Relegation Ferdinand Swatosch 1946 1947 Karl Wunderlich 1947 1948 Promotion to Landesliga Alois Münstermann 1948 1949 Promotion to Oberliga Friedrich Otto 1949 1950 Relegation to 2nd Oberliga West Fritz Kaiser 1950 1951 Hellmut Maidt 1951 1953 Donndorf 1953 1955 Relegation to Landesliga 1954 Otto Westphal 1955 1958 Arthur Gruber 1958 19 March 1961 first manager to be sacked Josef Rasselnberg 20 March 1961 1961 Jakob Wimmer 1961 April 1963 Promotion to 2nd Oberliga West 1962 Hellmut Maidt April 1963 1965 Qualification for Regionalliga West 1963 Robert Gebhardt 1965 1966 West German cup winner Westfalian cup winner Hans Wendtland 1966 November 1969 Egon Piechaczek November 1969 December 1971 Promotion to Bundesliga 1970 Hellmut Maidt January 1972 January 1972 Jan Notermans February 1972 October 1972 Relegation to Regionalliga 1972 Willi Nolting October 1972 February 1973 Norbert Lessle February 1973 September 1973 H.
